JobFullDesc: Global Operations' focus is on improving the health of our products and helping people understand how to use them through both direct support interactions as well as scalable solutions. Those who join our teams are very passionate about solving people’s issues and are strong advocates for the Facebook community. We need influencers who can align cross-functional partners to ensure the best possible experience for our platforms. If you like helping people, Global Operations is for you.   The Workforce Planning Specialist role will be a part of the team that supports long-term planning efforts to understand the capacity/workforce needed to: perform content moderation (items on the platform that are in violation of our community standards), ads on the platform (for validity and sales standards) as well as reviews of the solutions Facebook creates across the globe and platforms.Create, analyze and deliver capacity plans for current and following year on a monthly/quarterly/annual cadence to inform the business what demand is expected, the methodology and assumptions that were used in building the plan, and the story around any variances from prior plan to not just show data, but to create the story that helps inform the business as to what we expect to happen and why.Work with internal Facebook teams (data engineering, data analytics, WFM, partner management, etc.) to understand the inputs we are using, the trends we are seeing in actuals vs. forecasts as well as expected upcoming events to be used in the creation of the capacity plans to better predict what is expected to happen going forward.Perform bi-weekly/quarterly and ad-hoc capacity checks to understand the resources we have available, by area of the business, to support upcoming projects, as well as the expected impact if we were to approve the project if it is higher priority than other work that is being performed currently.Perform variance vs. forecast analysis to understand how accurate our inputs, assumptions and capacity plans are to identify areas of opportunity, and create continuous improvement plans to deliver more accurate forecasts iteration over iteration.Partner with key stakeholders (WFM, partner management, ops readiness, data analytics, etc.) to understand how they are using the information we provide, and what we can do to improve our deliveries to help them deliver value back to the business.Be the end to end process owner for the items above in collaboration with our customers and partners, to ensure the entire process is efficient, effective and at a high quality level to build trust and improve insights to guide the right
